org.webcurator.domain.model.core
Class Permission

java.lang.Object
  org.webcurator.domain.model.core.AbstractIdentityObject
      org.webcurator.domain.model.core.Permission
All Implemented Interfaces:
AgencyInTrayResource, InTrayResource, AgencyOwnable, Annotatable, HasDatabaseIdentity, HasIdentity, HasOid
public class Permission
extends AbstractIdentityObject
implements Annotatable, AgencyOwnable, InTrayResource, AgencyInTrayResource

Represents a Permission.

static int STATUS_REQUESTED
          Status constant for a permission that has been set to an agency, but for which no response has yet been received.
